title: The Man Who Broke the Bank at Monte Carlo

sources.title: Man Who Broke The Bank At Monte Carlo (1935)
sources.description: Ronald Colman, Joan Bennett, Colin Clive

metadata.Plot: Russian prince goes to Monte Carlo just after World War I with money supplied him by Parisian Russians. He wins but the casino operators want him honor the tradition of returning to the tables.
metadata.Writer: Nunnally Johnson, Howard Ellis Smith, Ilya Surguchev
metadata.Actors: Ronald Colman, Joan Bennett, Colin Clive
